DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of PF-06473871 in normal healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: Study To Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, And Pharmacokinetics Of PF-06473871 In Normal Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or females between the ages of 18 and 55 years inclusive Currently pregnant
